theorem lean_workbook_plus_1001 (Nat.choose 11 5) - (Nat.choose 5 2 * Nat.choose 6 3) = 262   := by
  conv => lhs; rw [← Nat.mod_add_div 11 5, ← Nat.mod_add_div 5 2, ← Nat.mod_add_div 6 3]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_10079 (x : ℝ) : 1 / Real.sqrt 10 = Real.sqrt 10 / 10   := by
  field_simp [Real.sqrt_eq_iff_sq_eq]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_10133 (2 * 10 * 100) = (10 * 2 * 100)   := by
  norm_num [Nat.mul_assoc, Nat.mul_comm, Nat.mul_left_comm]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_1021 ∑ k in Finset.Icc 0 23, (k+2).choose 2 = (26).choose 3   := by
  calc ∑ k in Finset.Icc 0 23, choose (k + 2) 2

theorem lean_workbook_plus_1031 (x : ℝ) (hx : x > 0) : x + 1 / x ≥ 2   := by
  field_simp [hx]
  rw [le_div_iff (by positivity)]
  nlinarith [sq_nonneg (x - 1)]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_10412 (k : ℕ) (h : 1 ≤ k) : 2 ^ (k - 1) ≥ k   := by
  induction h <;> simp [*, pow_succ, Nat.mul_le_mul_right]
  exact Nat.succ_le_of_lt (Nat.lt_pow_self (by norm_num) _)

theorem lean_workbook_plus_1072 : Real.cos 10 = Real.cos 10   := by
  simp [cos_10]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_1078 :
  ∑ k in (Finset.range 101), 2 * (k * (k + 1) / 2) = 343400   := by
  conv_lhs => rw [← Nat.mod_add_div (∑ k in Finset.range 101, 2 * (k * (k + 1) / 2)) 10000]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_1079 : (6 * Real.sqrt 5)^(1/3) = (180)^(1/6)   := by
  norm_num [Real.sqrt_eq_iff_sq_eq]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_10794  (a b : ℝ)
  (h₀ : a + b = 4)
  (h₁ : a * b = 7 / 2) :
  1 / (2 * a) + 1 / (2 * b) = 4 / 7   := by
  field_simp [h₀, h₁, mul_comm, mul_assoc, mul_left_comm]
  simp [h₀, h₁, mul_comm, mul_assoc, mul_left_comm]
  have h₂ : a ≠ 0 ∧ b ≠ 0 := by
  apply And.intro <;> nlinarith [h₀, h₁]
  field_simp [h₀, h₁, h₂.1, h₂.2]
  nlinarith [h₀, h₁, h₂.1, h₂.2]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_10822 : ∑ k in Finset.range 1000, k = 499500   := by
  calc
  ∑ k in Finset.range 1000, k
  _ = ∑ k in Finset.range 1000, k := by rfl
  _ = 499500 := by rfl

theorem lean_workbook_plus_10935 (2 * Nat.choose 12 2 + 6 * Nat.choose 6 2) / Nat.choose 60 2 = 37 / 295   := by
  norm_num [Nat.choose_eq_factorial_div_factorial, Nat.factorial]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_10983 5*(9+6+5+3) = 115   := by
  norm_num [show (5 : ℝ) * (9 + 6 + 5 + 3) = 115 by norm_num]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_11021 (p : ℝ) (hp : 3 ≤ p ∧ p < 31 / 9) (q : ℝ) (hq : q = (36 * p + 72 - p ^ 3) / (63 - 4 * p)) : p + 9 ≤ 4 * q   := by
  field_simp [hq]
  have h1 : 0 ≤ (p - 3) ^ 2 := sq_nonneg (p - 3)
  have h2 := hp.2
  rw [le_div_iff] <;> nlinarith

theorem lean_workbook_plus_11025 2^(2023-3) = 2^2020   := by
  norm_num [pow_succ, pow_succ, pow_succ, pow_succ, pow_succ, pow_succ, pow_succ, pow_succ, pow_succ, pow_succ, pow_succ, pow_succ, pow_succ, pow_succ, pow_succ, pow_succ, pow_succ, pow_succ, pow_succ, pow_succ, pow_succ]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_11032 (a b c : ℝ) (ha : a > 0) (hb : b > 0) (hc : c > 0) : (a^2 / (b^2 + 2 * c^2) + b^2 / (c^2 + 2 * a^2) + c^2 / (a^2 + 2 * b^2)) ≥ 1   := by
  field_simp [ha.ne', hb.ne', hc.ne']
  rw [le_div_iff (by positivity)]
  nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a^2 - b^2), sq_nonneg (b^2 - c^2), sq_nonneg (c^2 - a^2)]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_11131 (choose 9 6 / choose 16 6) = 3/286   := by
  norm_num [Nat.choose_eq_factorial_div_factorial, Nat.factorial]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_11304 : ∑ k in Finset.range 2004, (-1 : ℤ)^k * (k + 1) = -1002   := by
  conv_lhs => rw [← Nat.mod_add_div 2004 2]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_11427 (k : ℕ) (h : 1 ≤ k) : (1 : ℝ) + 1/k ≤ 2   := by
  field_simp [Nat.cast_pos.mpr (Nat.succ_pos 0)]
  rw [div_le_iff] <;> norm_cast <;> nlinarith [h]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_11519 (n : ℕ) (a : ℕ → ℝ) (t : ℝ) (h₁ : ∀ i, a (i + 1) - a i ≥ t) : ∀ i, a (i + 1) - a 1 ≥ i * t   := by
  intro i
  induction i with
| zero => simp
| succ i hi =>
  rw [Nat.succ_eq_add_one]
  simp [Nat.cast_add, Nat.cast_one]
  linarith [h₁ (i + 1)]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_11823 (a b c : ℝ) (ha : 0 < a) (hb : 0 < b) (hc : 0 < c) (hab : a * b + b * c + c * a = 3) : (1 / a + 2 * b) ^ (1 / 4) + (1 / b + 2 * c) ^ (1 / 4) + (1 / c + 2 * a) ^ (1 / 4) ≤ 3 * (3 : ℝ) ^ (1 / 4) / (a * b * c)   := by
  norm_num [ha, hb, hc, hab]
  have : 0 < a * b * c := mul_pos (mul_pos ha hb) hc
  rw [le_div_iff this, ← mul_assoc]
  nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a * b - 1), sq_nonneg (b * c - 1), sq_nonneg (c * a - 1)]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_11860 (a b c : ℝ) : (b^2 + c^2 - a^2) * (b - c) ^ 2 + (c^2 + a^2 - b^2) * (c - a) ^ 2 + (a^2 + b^2 - c^2) * (a - b) ^ 2 ≥ 0   := by
  simp only [sub_eq_add_neg, add_assoc, add_left_neg, add_zero]
  nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a + b + c), sq_nonneg (a + b - c), sq_nonneg (a - b + c), sq_nonneg (a - b - c)]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_11868 ∀ t, (t+2, 2*(t+2)^2-2*(t+2)-4) = (t+2, 2*t^2+6*t)   := by
  refine' fun t => Prod.ext _ _ <;> simp [mul_add, mul_comm, mul_left_comm]
  ring
  omega

theorem lean_workbook_plus_11985 ∀ x: ℝ, 0 ≤ x ∧ x ≤ 1 → 63 * x ^ 3 - 123 * x ^ 2 + 61 * x - 9 ≤ 0   := by
  refine' fun x hx => by nlinarith [sq_nonneg (x - 1), sq_nonneg (x - 1 / 3)]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_12052 (a b c d x y z : ℝ) (ha : 0 < a) (hb : 0 < b) (hc : 0 < c) (hd : 0 < d) (habc : a * a + b * b + c * c = d * d) : x * x + y * y + z * z ≥ (a * x + b * y + c * z) ^ 2 / d ^ 2   := by
  field_simp [ha.ne', hb.ne', hc.ne', hd.ne']
  rw [div_le_iff (by positivity)]
  nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a * y - b * x), sq_nonneg (a * z - c * x), sq_nonneg (b * z - c * y)]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_12105 : ∀ k : ℤ, (4 * k + 1) ^ 4 - 1 ≡ 0 [ZMOD 16]   := by
  simp only [Int.ModEq, Int.dvd_iff_emod_eq_zero, Int.add_emod, Int.mul_emod, Int.mod_self]
  exact fun k ↦ by ring_nf; omega

theorem lean_workbook_plus_12280 (p t r : ℝ) (h₀ : 0 < p ∧ 0 < t) (h₁ : p < t) (h₂ : 0 < r) : p / (t - p) < r ↔ p < (r * t) / (1 + r)   := by
  rw [div_lt_iff (sub_pos.mpr h₁), lt_div_iff (add_pos (by positivity) h₂), mul_comm]
  constructor <;> intro h <;> nlinarith [h₀.1, h₀.2, h₁, h₂]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_12283 b c : ℝ) (hx: a > 0 ∧ b > 0 ∧ c > 0) (hab : a + b > c) (hbc : b + c > a) (hca : a + c > b) :  (a + b) * (a + c) * (b + c) >= 8 * (a + b - c) * (a + c - b) * (b + c - a)   := by
  nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a - b), sq_nonneg (b - c), sq_nonneg (c - a)]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_12422 (x : ℝ) (hx : |x| ≤ 2) : ‖(2 * x ^ 2 + 3 * x + 2) / (x ^ 2 + 2)‖ ≤ 8   := by
  simp [abs_le] at hx ⊢
  rw [abs_of_nonneg (by nlinarith [sq_nonneg x]), abs_of_nonneg (by nlinarith [sq_nonneg x])]
  rw [div_le_iff] <;> nlinarith

theorem lean_workbook_plus_12567 : ∀ n : ℕ, (1 / (n + 1)) * ∑ i in Finset.range n, (1 / (2 * i + 1)) ≥ (1 / n) * ∑ i in Finset.range n, (1 / (2 * i + 2))   := by
  intro n
  simp [Finset.sum_range_succ, Finset.mul_sum]
  simp [Finset.sum_range_succ, mul_add, mul_comm, mul_left_comm]
  refine' Finset.sum_le_sum (fun x hx => by positivity)

theorem lean_workbook_plus_12599 : ∑ k in Finset.Icc 1 2006, (-1 : ℤ)^k = 0   := by
  conv => lhs; rw [← add_zero (∑ k in Finset.Icc 1 2006, (-1 : ℤ) ^ k)]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_12622 :
  1 / 2 * ((Real.sqrt 2 / 2)^2 * (-(Real.sqrt 2 / 2) - 0)^2 + (-(Real.sqrt 2 / 2))^2 * (0 - (Real.sqrt 2 / 2))^2) = 1 / 4   := by
  norm_num [Real.sqrt_eq_iff_sq_eq]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_12657 (n : ℕ) : ∑ k in Finset.range (49+1), (-1 : ℤ)^k * (99 : ℕ).choose (2 * k) = (-1 : ℤ)^49 * 2^49   := by
  conv_lhs => rw [← Nat.mod_add_div 99 2]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_12768 :
  ((∑ k in (Nat.divisors 768), k) / 768 - (∑ k in (Nat.divisors 384), k) / 384) = 1 / 192   := by
  conv => lhs; rw [← Nat.mod_add_div (∑ k in Nat.divisors 768, k) 768, ← Nat.mod_add_div (∑ k in Nat.divisors 384, k) 384]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_12883 ∀ x:ℝ, (x<1.5 ∨ x>8.5) ↔ (4*x^2-40*x+51>0)   := by
  simp [sub_eq_add_neg, add_comm, add_left_comm]
  norm_num [sq, mul_add, add_mul, mul_comm, mul_left_comm]
  refine' fun x => ⟨fun h => _, fun h => _⟩
  obtain h | h := h <;> nlinarith
  obtain h | h := lt_or_le x (3 / 2) <;> [left; right] <;> nlinarith

theorem lean_workbook_plus_12936 : 2 ^ (Nat.totient 77) ≡ 1 [ZMOD 77]   := by
  conv_lhs => rw [← pow_one 2]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_13017 (x y z : ℝ) (hx : x ∈ Set.Ioi 0) (hy : y ∈ Set.Ioi 0) (hz : z ∈ Set.Ioi 0) (h : x * y * z = 1) :
  x ^ 2 / (x ^ 2 + y ^ 2) + y ^ 2 / (y ^ 2 + z ^ 2) + z ^ 2 / (z ^ 2 + x ^ 2) ≤ 3   := by
  field_simp [Set.mem_Ioi] at hx hy hz ⊢
  field_simp [hx, hy, hz, h]
  rw [div_le_iff] <;> nlinarith [sq_nonneg (x * y), sq_nonneg (y * z), sq_nonneg (z * x)]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_13020 3 * ∑ k in Finset.range 10, k^2 = 855   := by
  simp [Finset.sum_range_succ, Finset.sum_range_succ, Finset.sum_range_succ, Finset.sum_range_succ, Finset.sum_range_succ, Finset.sum_range_succ, Finset.sum_range_succ, Finset.sum_range_succ, Finset.sum_range_succ, Finset.sum_range_succ, Finset.sum_range_succ, Finset.sum_range_succ, Finset.sum_range_succ, Finset.sum_range_succ]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_13094 (f : ℝ → ℝ):(∀ x y, (x + y) * (f x - f y) = f (x ^ 2) - f (y ^ 2)) ↔ ∃ a b:ℝ, ∀ x, f x = a * x + b   := by
  aesop
  exact ⟨f 1 - f 0, f 0, fun x ↦ by linarith [a x 0, a 1 0, a 1 x]⟩
  linarith [h_1 x, h_1 y]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_1311 (x y z : ℝ) (hx : 0 < x) (hy : 0 < y) (hz : 0 < z) : 3 ≤ x / y + y / z + z / x   := by
  have : 0 < x * y * z := mul_pos (mul_pos hx hy) hz
  have : 0 < x * y * z := mul_pos (mul_pos hx hy) hz
  have : 0 < x * y * z := mul_pos (mul_pos hx hy) hz
  have : 0 < x * y * z := mul_pos (mul_pos hx hy) hz
  have : 0 < x * y * z := mul_pos (mul_pos hx hy) hz
  have : 0 < x * y * z := mul_pos (mul_pos hx hy) hz
  have : 0 < x * y := mul_pos hx hy
  have : 0 < y * z := mul_pos hy hz
  have : 0 < x * z := mul_pos hx hz
  have : 0 < x * y * z := mul_pos (mul_pos hx hy) hz
  have : 0 < x * y * z := by positivity
  have : 0 < x * y * z := mul_pos (mul_pos hx hy) hz
  have : 0 < x * y * z := mul_pos (mul_pos hx hy) hz
  have : 0 < x * y * z := mul_pos (mul_pos hx hy) hz
  have : 0 < x * y * z := mul_pos (mul_pos hx hy) hz
  have : 0 < x * y * z := mul_pos (mul_pos hx hy) hz
  have : 0 < x * y * z := by positivity
  field_simp [add_comm]
  rw [le_div_iff (by positivity)]
  nlinarith [sq_nonneg (x - y), sq_nonneg (y - z), sq_nonneg (z - x)]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_13125 (1680 / (1680 + 448)) = (15 / 19)   := by
  norm_num [Nat.div_eq_of_eq_mul_left, Nat.div_eq_of_eq_mul_left, Nat.div_eq_of_eq_mul_left, Nat.div_eq_of_eq_mul_left, Nat.div_eq_of_eq_mul_left, Nat.div_eq_of_eq_mul_left, Nat.div_eq_of_eq_mul_left, Nat.div_eq_of_eq_mul_left, Nat.div_eq_of_eq_mul_left, Nat.div_eq_of_eq_mul_left, Nat.div_eq_of_eq_mul_left, Nat.div_eq_of_eq_mul_left, Nat.div_eq_of_eq_mul_left, Nat.div_eq_of_eq_mul_left, Nat.div_eq_of_eq_mul_left]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_13196 (f : ℝ → ℝ) (x : ℝ) (f_def : f x = x^2 - 2) : f x = 0 ↔ x = √2 ∨ x = -√2   := by
  simp only [f_def, sub_eq_zero]
  rw [← sq_eq_sq_iff_eq_or_eq_neg]
  simp [Real.sqrt_eq_iff_sq_eq]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_1331 (n : ℕ) (hn : 1 ≤ n) : Real.cos (π / (n + 1)) > Real.cos (π / n)   := by
  obtain ⟨n, rfl⟩ : ∃ m, n = m + 1 := Nat.exists_eq_succ_of_ne_zero (zero_lt_one.trans_le hn).ne'
  apply Real.cos_lt_cos_of_nonneg_of_le_pi
  all_goals have := Real.pi_pos.le
  all_goals have := Real.pi_pos.le
  all_goals have := Real.pi_pos.le
  apply div_nonneg <;> linarith
  all_goals have := Real.pi_pos.le
  all_goals have := div_pos (pi_pos) (Nat.cast_add_one_pos (n + 1))
  all_goals field_simp [add_assoc, add_comm, add_left_comm]
  apply le_of_sub_nonneg
  all_goals have := Real.pi_pos.le
  all_goals field_simp [add_assoc, add_comm, add_left_comm]
  all_goals have := sq_nonneg (π - π * (n + 1) / (n + 1 + 1))
  all_goals have := sq_nonneg (π * (n + 1) - π)
  all_goals have := sq_nonneg (π * (n + 1) - π)
  all_goals have := sq_nonneg (π - π * (n + 1) / (n + 1 + 1))
  all_goals have := sq_nonneg (π - π * (n + 1) / (n + 1 + 1))
  all_goals have := sq_nonneg (π - π * (n + 1) / (n + 1 + 1))
  all_goals have := sq_nonneg (π * (n + 1) - π)
  apply div_nonneg <;> nlinarith [sq_nonneg (π * (n + 1) - π)]
  ring_nf at *
  apply mul_lt_mul_of_pos_left <;> norm_num [hn]
  all_goals norm_cast
  all_goals have h1 : 0 < 2 + n := by linarith
  all_goals have h2 : 0 < 1 + n := by linarith
  all_goals norm_num [hn, h1, h2]
  have h3 : 0 < 2 + n := by linarith
  field_simp [h1, h2, h3]
  all_goals have h4 : 0 < 2 + n := by linarith
  all_goals norm_cast
  all_goals have h5 : 0 < 1 + n := by linarith
  all_goals norm_num
  any_goals field_simp [h1.ne', h2.ne', h3.ne', h4.ne', h5.ne']
  any_goals positivity
  rw [div_lt_div_iff] <;> linarith

theorem lean_workbook_plus_13334 : ℕ) : n = n   := by
  simp only [Nat.add_zero, Nat.add_succ, Nat.zero_add, Nat.succ_add]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_13371 (a b : ℝ) (hab : a ≠ b) : (a + b) ^ 2 / 4 > a * b   := by
  have h1 : 0 < (a - b) ^ 2 := sq_pos_of_ne_zero (a - b) (sub_ne_zero.2 hab)
  nlinarith [sq_nonneg (a - b)]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_1355 (x y z : ℝ) (hx : 0 < x) (hy : 0 < y) (hz : 0 < z) : (y / (x * y + y + 1) + z / (y * z + z + 1) + x / (z * x + x + 1)) ≤ 1   := by
  field_simp [add_comm]
  rw [div_le_iff (by positivity)]
  nlinarith [sq_nonneg (x * y * z - 1), sq_nonneg (x * y - y * z), sq_nonneg (y * z - z * x),
  sq_nonneg (z * x - x * y), sq_nonneg (x * y * z - x * y), sq_nonneg (x * y * z - y * z),
  sq_nonneg (x * y * z - z * x), sq_nonneg (x * y * z - 1)]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_13705  (x : ℝ)
  (h₀ : 1 ≤ x ∧ x ≤ 3 / 2) :
  x^3 + (8 * x^3) / (2 * x - 1)^3 ≤ 9   := by
  have h₁ : 0 < 2 * x - 1 := by linarith
  have h₂ : 0 < 2 * x - 1 := h₁
  have h₃ : 0 < (2 * x - 1) ^ 3 := pow_pos h₁ 3
  field_simp [h₀.1, h₀.2, h₁, h₂, h₃]
  rw [div_le_iff h₃]
  nlinarith [sq_nonneg (x ^ 2 - 1), sq_nonneg (x ^ 2 - 2 * x + 1)]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_13877 : ∀ d e : ℤ, (d * e ≡ -1 [ZMOD 24]) → (d^2 * e ≡ e [ZMOD 24]) ∧ (d^2 * e ≡ -d [ZMOD 24]) → d + e ≡ 0 [ZMOD 24]   := by
  rintro d e h₀ h₁
  simp only [Int.ModEq, Int.ofNat_add, Int.ofNat_mul, Int.ofNat_mod] at * <;> omega

theorem lean_workbook_plus_1391 {n : ℤ} (h : n = m ^ 2) : n ≡ 0 [ZMOD 4] ∨ n ≡ 1 [ZMOD 4]   := by
  simp [Int.ModEq, Int.emod_eq_emod_iff_emod_sub_eq_zero, h]
  obtain ⟨k, rfl⟩ | ⟨k, rfl⟩ := Int.even_or_odd m <;> ring_nf <;> simp [Int.mod_self]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_13924 (x : ℝ) (hx : 0 < x ∧ x < 1) :
  ∑' i : ℕ, x ^ i = 1 / (1 - x)   := by
  simp [tsum_geometric_of_lt_1 hx.1.le hx.2, hx.1, hx.2]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_14071 (n : ℕ) : 1 / 4 ≤ ∑ x in Finset.range n, (2 * ↑x / (↑x ^ 4 + 3 * ↑x ^ 2 + 4)) ∧ ∑ x in Finset.range n, (2 * ↑x / (↑x ^ 4 + 3 * ↑x ^ 2 + 4)) ≤ 1 / 2   := by
  constructor <;> norm_num [Finset.sum_range_succ, Finset.sum_range_zero]
  intro x hx
  rw [Nat.div_eq_of_lt]
  nlinarith [sq_nonneg (x^2 - 1), sq_nonneg (x^2 + 1)]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_14131 5! = 5 * 4 * 3 * 2 * 1   := by
  norm_num [Nat.factorial_succ, Nat.factorial_succ, Nat.factorial_succ, Nat.factorial_succ, Nat.factorial_succ]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_14154 (a b : ℝ) (ha : 0 < a) (hb : 0 < b) : ∃ Q : ℚ, b * Q > 1   := by
  obtain ⟨Q, hQ⟩ := exists_rat_gt (1 / b)
  rw [div_lt_iff hb] at hQ
  exact ⟨Q, by linarith⟩

theorem lean_workbook_plus_14183 : ∑ n in Finset.Icc 1 1999, (1 + 1 / (n * (n + 1))) = 1999 + 1999 / 2000   := by
  conv => lhs; rw [← add_zero (∑ n in Finset.Icc 1 1999, (1 + 1 / (n * (n + 1))))]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_14185 (n : ℕ) : choose (2 * n) 2 = 2 * choose n 2 + n^2   := by
  induction n <;> simp [Nat.choose, *] <;> ring
  nlinarith [choose_succ_succ, choose_succ_succ]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_14207  (x y z p : ℝ)
  (h₀ : p = x * y * z)
  (h₁ : x * (p - 3) = -1)
  (h₂ : y * (p - 5) = -2)
  (h₃ : z * (p - 2) = -4) :
  p^4 - 10 * p^3 + 31 * p^2 - 30 * p + 8 = 0   := by
  cases h₀
  linear_combination h₁ * h₂ * h₃

theorem lean_workbook_plus_14283 (n : ℕ) (hn : 0 < n) : (∑ i in Finset.range n, (1 / (i + 1)^2)) ≤ (5 / 3) - (2 / (2 * n + 1))   := by
  induction' n with n ih <;> simp [Finset.sum_range_succ]
  induction n <;> simp [Finset.sum_range_succ]
  have h₁ := ih (by linarith)
  simpa [Finset.sum_range_succ] using h₁

theorem lean_workbook_plus_14326 3^7 = 2187   := by

theorem lean_workbook_plus_14398 37^2 + 36^2 = 2665   := by

theorem lean_workbook_plus_22613 (a b c : ℝ) (ha : a ≥ 0) (hb : b ≥ 0) (hc : c ≥ 0) (habc : a * b * c = 1) : a + b + c ≥ 2 / (a + 1) + 2 / (b + 1) + 2 / (c + 1)   := by

theorem lean_workbook_plus_22909 (n : ℕ) : Real.sqrt ((3 * n + 3) / (3 * n + 1)) ≤ (2 * n + 2) / (2 * n + 1)   := by

  have h2 : 0 ≤ (3 * n + 3) / (3 * n + 1) := by exact h1
  have h3 : 0 ≤ (3 * n + 3) / (3 * n + 1) := h1
  have h4 : 0 ≤ (3 * n + 3) / (3 * n + 1) := by linarith
  norm_num [Real.sqrt_le_iff]
  refine ⟨by positivity,?_⟩
  (ring_nf; field_simp [h1, h2, h3, h4])
  rw [div_le_div_iff] <;> nlinarith

theorem lean_workbook_plus_23151 (x : ℝ) (f : ℝ → ℝ) (hf: f = fun x => if x = 1 then a else if x = -1 then -a + Real.log 4 else Real.log ((2 * (x + 1) ^ 2) / (x - 1) ^ 2)) : (∀ x, (x ≠ 1 ∧ x ≠ -1) → f x = Real.log ((2 * (x + 1) ^ 2) / (x - 1) ^ 2)) ∧ f 1 = a ∧ f (-1) = -a + Real.log 4   := by

theorem lean_workbook_plus_2319 (x y : ℝ) (hx : 1 < x) (hy : 1 < y) : (x^2 / (y - 1) + y^2 / (x - 1)) ≥ 8   := by

  have h2 : 0 < y - 1 := by linarith
  have h3 := sq_nonneg (x - 2)

  have h6 := sq_nonneg (x - y - 1)
  have h7 : 0 ≤ (x - 1) * (y - 1) := mul_nonneg (sub_nonneg.mpr hx.le) (sub_nonneg.mpr hy.le)
  field_simp [h1, h2]

  nlinarith [sq_nonneg (x - 2), sq_nonneg (y - 2), sq_nonneg (x - y), sq_nonneg (x - y - 1)]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_24205 (n : ℕ) : (n * (n + 1) * (2 * n + 1) / 6) ≤ 2003 → n ≤ 17   := by

theorem lean_workbook_plus_28975 (x : ℝ) : x^2 - 4*x + 2 = 0 ↔ x = 2 + Real.sqrt 2 ∨ x = 2 - Real.sqrt 2   := by

  (x * y / (x^2 + (x * y) + y^2) + y * z / (y^2 + (y * z) + z^2) + z * x / (z^2 + (z * x) + x^2)) ≤ 1   := by
  have h₁ : 0 < x^2 + x*y + y^2 := by nlinarith
  have h₂ : 0 < y^2 + y*z + z^2 := by nlinarith
  have h₃ : 0 < z^2 + z*x + x^2 := by nlinarith
  field_simp [h₀.1, h₀.2.1, h₀.2.2, h₁, h₂, h₃]
  rw [div_le_iff (by positivity)]
  nlinarith [sq_nonneg (x*y - y*z), sq_nonneg (y*z - z*x), sq_nonneg (z*x - x*y)]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_39940 (x : ℝ) (hx : 0 < x ∧ x < 1) : (x^2/(1 - x) + (1 - x)^2/x) ≥ 1   := by

  have h1 : 0 < 1 - x := by linarith
  rw [add_comm]
  have h2 : 0 < x := hx.1
  rw [div_eq_mul_inv, mul_comm]
  have h3 : 0 < 1 - x := by linarith
  field_simp [h1, h2, h3]
  ring_nf
  field_simp [h1, h2, h3]
  rw [div_eq_mul_inv]
  have h4 : 0 < x - x ^ 2 := by nlinarith
  field_simp [h1, h2, h3, h4]
  rw [le_div_iff h4]

  norm_num
  ring_nf
  nlinarith [sq_nonneg (x - 1), sq_nonneg (2 * x - 1)]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_42229 (p : ℕ) (hp : p.Prime) (a : ZMod p) (ha : a ≠ 0) : a = a⁻¹ ↔ a = 1 ∨ a = p-1   := by

  refine ⟨fun h ↦?_, fun h ↦?_⟩
  rw [← sub_eq_zero] at h
  have : a * (a - a⁻¹) = a * 0 := by rw [h]
  rw [mul_sub] at this
  rw [← mul_right_inj' ha] at this
  simp [mul_assoc, mul_comm, mul_left_comm] at this
  cases' this with h₁ h₂
  rw [h₁, inv_zero] at h
  all_goals aesop
  simp only [sub_eq_zero] at h₂
  have h₃ : a * a = 1 := h₂
  apply eq_or_eq_neg_of_sq_eq_sq _ 1
  rw [pow_two, h₃, one_pow]
  norm_num

theorem lean_workbook_plus_69860 (x : ℝ) : x^2 - x - 1 = 0 ↔ x = (1 + Real.sqrt 5)/2 ∨ x = (1 - Real.sqrt 5)/2   := by

  all_goals norm_num

  ring_nf at h h' ⊢
  apply eq_of_sub_eq_zero
  ring_nf at h ⊢
  apply (mul_right_inj' (sub_ne_zero.2 h')).1

theorem lean_workbook_plus_70353 (a b c : ℝ) (h₁ : 0 < a ∧ 0 < b ∧ 0 < c) (h₂ : a ≤ b ∧ b ≤ c) : a / b + b / c + c / a ≥ b / a + c / b + a / c   := by

theorem lean_workbook_plus_70713  (x : ℝ)

  (h₁ : x + 10 = gallons_of_33percent_acid)

  (h₃ : 2 * x + 12 = total_gallons_of_overall_solutions)

theorem lean_workbook_plus_72797  (a b c : ℝ)

theorem lean_workbook_plus_729  (n : ℕ) :
  2 * Real.sqrt n + 1 / Real.sqrt (n + 1) ≤ 2 * Real.sqrt (n + 1)   := by
  have h1 : 0 ≤ (Real.sqrt (n : ℝ) - Real.sqrt (n + 1))^2 := sq_nonneg _
  ring_nf at h1 ⊢
  have h2 := sq_nonneg (Real.sqrt n - Real.sqrt (1 + n))
  have h3 := Real.sq_sqrt (Nat.cast_nonneg n)
  have h4 : √(1 + n) ^ 2 = 1 + n := Real.sq_sqrt (by linarith)
  have h5 := Real.sqrt_nonneg (n : ℝ)
  have h6 : 0 ≤ √(1 + n) := Real.sqrt_nonneg (1 + n)
  have h7 := Real.sqrt_nonneg (1 + n)
  have h8 := Real.sqrt_nonneg (1 + n)
  have h9 := Real.sqrt_nonneg (1 + n)
  field_simp at h1 h2 h3 h4 h5 h6 h7 h8 h9 ⊢
  ring_nf at h1 h3 h4 ⊢
  field_simp [h5, h6, h7, h8, h9]
  rw [div_le_iff (by positivity)]
  ring_nf at h1 ⊢
  field_simp [h5, h6, h7, h8, h9] at h1 ⊢
  nlinarith [h5, h6, h7, h8, h9, h1]

theorem lean_workbook_plus_82004 (z w : ℂ) (h₁ : z + w = 8 + 6 * Complex.I) (h₂ : ‖z - w‖ = 4) : ‖z‖^2 + ‖w‖^2 = 58   := by
